title: Camera working problems
content:
Hello. I had some frontal camera issues, it is not working at all. But, it's ok. 
But, now my second camera is not working. So, the main camera and the frontal one, both of them aren't working at all. I have a black screen when I am trying to open the Cera, and the it is closing automatically.
And, I cannot use my cameras in any apps. I don't know what is the problem. I deleted the cashe, I restarted the phone, I updated the camera from app store. But, this didn't work. 
Please help me!
Thank you in advance!
